summary: REQ-116 is largely implemented by recording an inspectionStart timestamp on inspection start and calculating the inspection duration at solve start (SolveTimer onStart) to determine +2/DNF. However, the diff introduces new user-facing toast text for penalties, which conflicts with the requirement to keep existing messages/toasts unchanged.

missing_requirements.requirement: The existing user-facing messages/toasts for +2 and DNF remain in English and are triggered based on the corrected timing.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows new toast message strings being introduced for the +2 and DNF inspection penalties, rather than preserving the existing user-facing messages/toasts.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced new inspection penalty toast copy (“Inspection time exceeded 15s: +2 penalty applied” and “Inspection time exceeded 17s: DNF applied”).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requires keeping existing user-facing messages/toasts (only wiring accurate timestamps). Adding/replacing toast copy is a user-facing change not explicitly requested.
